short_summary: The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) has a requirement for the procurement of Architectural & Engineering Services for the Detail Seismic Evaluation of the official residence of the Embassy of Canada to Barbados.
description: The Document outlines the Detail Seismic Evaluation of the official residence of the Embassy of Canada to Barbados.
full_summary:
===============

**Detailed Seismic Evaluation for Embassy Residence in Barbados**
---------------------------------------------------------

### Tender Overview

The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development (DFATD) requires a detailed seismic evaluation of the official residence for the Embassy of Canada to Barbados. This opportunity is solicited under Supply Arrangement (SA) AWT-AESVCS-STRUCT-15129/B.

**Contract Details**
-------------------

*   Solicitation Number: [23-222106](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/14/83214f9805794d774196d15ac62380d7/23-222106_-_npp.pdf)
*   Tender Closing Date: December 14, 2022, 2:00:00 PM EST
*   Amendment Number: 2
*   Amendment Date: November 28, 2022

**Description of Works**
----------------------

The successful proponent will be required to conduct a detailed seismic evaluation for the official residence of the Embassy of Canada to Barbados.

**Access to Tender Documents**
-----------------------------

The complete tender documents can be found at the link below:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/14/83214f9805794d774196d15ac62380d7/23-222106_-_npp.pdf

You may contact the below-mentioned contact for more information or to submit your proposal:

**Contact Information**
---------------------

*   Name: Irena Stevic
*   Email: [irena.stevic@international.gc.ca](mailto:irena.stevic@international.gc.ca)
*   Phone: 343-203-2582

Note: The original entry seems to be over-encoded with extra fields. I disregarded the extra fields and only kept the relevant information required for a tender announcement. The rewritten entry was always under 400 words.  There were also linguistic changes to enhance the clarity and flow of the text. I have also copied the links properly in a markdown format. As a technical writer, I hope this should come out in the professional standard you have anticipated. Let me know if there's anything that needs to be improved upon.  This rewritten entry can be modulated further if required.
